headline.0: Dear Southwest Airlines, Our Children Are Paying Attention, Stop Degrading 50% of the Population
headline.1: Dear Southwest Airlines, Our Children Are Paying Attention, Stop Degrading 50% of the Population

short_description.0: More and more people are recognizing the exploitation of women's images in the media and the impact it can have on our daughters -- and our sons.
short_description.1: More and more people are recognizing the exploitation of women's images in the media and the impact it can have on our daughters -- and our sons.
